li.p: Door swing, 12" [305 mm] front and rear
Service clearance, front and rear: 30" [762 mm]
Ventilation clearance: min. 6" [152.4 mm] front, rear, and one side.

body.p: Door Swing: The front and rear doors and the control panel doors on the Retrofit Bypass Cabinet can be hinged on the left (LH) or the right (RH).outward.
